title: Sep Diff Eq with slope and slope field part - b

content.description:
The following are related to this scenario:

Consider the differential equation <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mn>2</mn> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48F4@</annotation> </semantics> </math>,where x≠0 . Let y=f(x) be the particular solution to the differential equation with initial condition f(1)=2 .
content.question: On the axes provided, sketch a slope field for the given differential equation at the nine points indicated.

frqParts.text: On the axes provided, sketch a slope field for the given differential equation at the nine points indicated.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
